actions.text: Committee on Joint Deficit Reduction. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Domenici. Without written report.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Senate passed companion measure H.J.RES. 672 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: Senate Temporary Joint Committee on Deficit Reduction

official_title: An original joint resolution ratifying and affirming the report of January 15, 1986, of the Director of the Office of Management and Budget and the Director of the Congressional Budget Office with respect to fiscal year 1986.

summary.text: Ratifies and affirms as law the report issued by the Directors of the Congressional Budget Office and the Office of Management and Budget on January 15, 1986, setting forth FY 1986 budget cuts pursuant to the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act).

titles.title: An original joint resolution ratifying and affirming the report of January 15, 1986, of the Director of the Office of Management and Budget and the Director of the Congressional Budget Office with respect to fiscal year 1986.
